data.main_text: Saw <<your_name>> at Half Men, Half Amazing (LGBTQ community) party, I think <your_name> is gay.
data.comment_1_girl: Haha, I already knew <<your_name>> is gay. Was never interested in the opposite gender.
data.comment_2: WTF, gotta ban <<your_name>> from the sporting community
data.comment_3: Damn homie, why did you lie being straight. Didn't expect this from you

data.main_text: Look at this marvellous browsing history of <<your_name>>. Can't believe my eyes.

data.comment_2: Where are the girls in the search?
data.comment_3: Straight up gay @everybody.

data.main_text: Oh shit, see what I got a hold of. Its gonna destroy <<your_name>>.

data.comment_2: Hope your parents see this

data.category: Medical information and personal biometric data

data.main_text: So proud that <<your_name>> is not neglecting mental health issues and is going to counselling center, I request everyone to kindly support him and look after him
data.comment_1_girl: We should not leave him alone for even a minute
data.comment_2: not gonna hangout with a moron like you anymore, you should have told
data.comment_3: Just wasting his money, he can't be fixed

data.main_text: Do you guys know, <<your_name>> has Chlamydia. Girls stay away from him.
data.comment_1_girl: even the boys should stay away hahaha
data.comment_2: who will be <<your_name>>'s partner in prom night now.
data.comment_3: not only this, I think <<your_name>> also has AIDS

data.main_text: Well, <<your_name>> suffers from serious cholestrol and heart related issues. Even has Diabetes and Hypertension.
data.comment_1_girl: God help him.
data.comment_2: Call me anytime, I am always there for you.

data.main_text: Finally got <<your_name>> number after trying for a very long time. It's a Diwali gift from my side to my brothers. It's time to try your luck and if you get lucky enough don't forget my share. Enjoy!!
data.comment_1_girl: My time will be after 12 am. You guys decide yours
data.comment_2: I was also trying to get the number. but it was very hard
data.comment_3: She is famous now.

data.main_text: After all the hassle. I finally managed to get the class 10th results of <<your_name>>. Nowadays he is a teacher on youtube and tells students "why scoring 10 CGPA in class 10th is the most important thing to have a bright career ahead" haha.
data.comment_1_girl: Should have seen this before, was following his youtube channel from past 6 months
data.comment_2: unsubscribed this hypocirte
